languages.text: "Обычно в такие моменты злятся, просят передумать или спрашивают, в чем причина. Тебе все равно?"
"I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"
languages.original_text: "Обычно в такие моменты злятся, просят передумать или спрашивают, в чем причина. Тебе все равно?"

traits.locale_text: "I was expecting you to be angry, ask me to change my mind, or demand to know the reason. Yet you do not care at all?"
"I was expecting you to be angry, ask me to change my mind, or demand to know the reason. Yet you do not care at all?"
"I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"
"I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"
"I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"
"I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"

languages.text: «Creí que se enfadaría. Imaginé que trataría de disuadirme, o exigiría conocer el motivo. ¿Es que no le molesta mi decisión?».
languages.original_text: "I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"

traits.locale_text: «Creí que se enfadaría. Imaginé que trataría de disuadirme, o exigiría conocer el motivo. ¿Es que no le molesta mi decisión?».

languages.text: 「お前は起こると思っていたよ。私に考えを変えるよう求めたり、理由を知りたいと言うと思っていた。私の判断が気にならないのか？」
languages.original_text: "I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は起こると思っていたよ。私に考えを変えるよう求めたり、理由を知りたいと言うと思っていた。私の判断が気にならないのか？」

languages.text: “我本以为你会生气。我以为你会要求我改变主意，或是想要了解我这么做的理由。这个决定就不会让你烦恼吗？”
languages.original_text: "I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"

traits.locale_text: “我本以为你会生气。我以为你会要求我改变主意，或是想要了解我这么做的理由。这个决定就不会让你烦恼吗？”

languages.text: "Ich hatte erwartet, dass Ihr wütend seid. Ich dachte, Ihr würdet mich auffordern, meine Meinung zu ändern, oder verlangen, meine Gründe zu erfahren. Ärgert Euch meine Entscheidung nicht?"
languages.original_text: "I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte erwartet, dass Ihr wütend seid. Ich dachte, Ihr würdet mich auffordern, meine Meinung zu ändern, oder verlangen, meine Gründe zu erfahren. Ärgert Euch meine Entscheidung nicht?"

languages.text: « Je m'attendais à ce que vous vous mettiez en colère. Je pensais que vous me demanderiez de changer d'avis ou que vous exigeriez des explications. Ma décision ne vous contrarie-t-elle pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"

traits.locale_text: « Je m'attendais à ce que vous vous mettiez en colère. Je pensais que vous me demanderiez de changer d'avis ou que vous exigeriez des explications. Ma décision ne vous contrarie-t-elle pas ? »

languages.text: "Kızgın olmanı beklerdim. Fikrimi değiştirmemi istemeyecek misin? Sebebini öğrenmek istemez misin? Bu kararım seni rahatsız etmedi mi?"
languages.original_text: "I expected you to be angry. I thought you would ask me to change my mind, or demand to know my reasons. Are you not bothered by my decision?"
